p: Homogeneity of variances was evaluated by examining plots of residuals against predicted. We used residual normality plots to examine the assumption of normality of residuals. Outliers were identified as those treatment means whose absolute value studentized residuals were greater than t 68, 0.95 (resulting from t N-P-1, 0.95, P being three parameters and N = 72 observations for a 95% confidence interval) and deleted from the analysis.
